description:
Adversarial probes designed to expose specific weaknesses in
            LLM document understanding. Each probe targets a known or
            suspected failure mode.

categories.structural_ambiguity: Documents with unclear or ambiguous hierarchy
categories.semantic_interference: Similar content designed to cause confusion

probes.name: Orphaned Content
probes.description: Tests whether model correctly identifies that 'Important note' belongs to Phase 1 or is document-level
probes.target_weakness: Tendency to associate content with following rather than preceding section

probes.name: Competing Hierarchies
probes.description: Tests handling of ambiguous subsection placement
probes.target_weakness: Assuming well-formed hierarchy when structure is ambiguous

probes.name: Depth Confusion
probes.description: Tests handling of non-sequential header depths
probes.target_weakness: Conflating visual position with explicit depth markers

probes.name: Similar Entities
probes.target_weakness: Stopping at first match without checking qualifiers

probes.name: Updated Values
probes.description: Tests whether model uses corrected or original values
probes.target_weakness: Using first-encountered value instead of tracking updates

probes.name: Negation Trap
probes.description: Tests correct processing of CAN vs CANNOT
probes.target_weakness: Missing negations when similar positive statements exist

probes.name: Primacy Trap
probes.description: Tests whether late-document corrections override earlier repeated information
probes.target_weakness: Over-weighting information that appears multiple times early

probes.name: Recency Trap
probes.description: Tests whether informal last-mentioned info overrides formal decisions
probes.target_weakness: Over-weighting recent/last information regardless of authority

probes.name: Markdown in Code
probes.description: Tests whether markdown inside code blocks is incorrectly parsed as structure
probes.trap_answer: 4 (including the ones in the code block)

probes.name: Nested Quotes
probes.description: Tests attribution tracking through nested quotations

probes.name: Conditional Cascade
probes.description: Tests multi-step conditional reasoning with order of operations
probes.target_weakness: Order of operations in multi-step calculations
probes.trap_answer: $7.50 (incorrectly applying discount to base then doubling)

probes.name: Exception to Exception
probes.description: Tests handling of nested exceptions and overrides
